Interface FileImpler

All Superinterfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
All Known Implementing Classes:
Implementor
public interface FileImpler extends JarImpler
An extended version of JarImpler that provides default file constants for code generation.

This interface defines common constants used in generating:

  • Java source files: .java
  • Jar archives: .jar
Author:
alnmlbch
See Also:
  • JarImpler
